prompt: Build a vibrant green-themed analytics dashboard with a fresh, modern design. Include a header with 'Performance Analytics' title and a refresh icon button. Create three large horizontal metric cards stacked vertically, each showing different KPIs: 'Monthly Revenue' ($45,678 with +12% growth), 'Customer Acquisition' (3,456 new customers with +8% growth), and 'Product Sales' (23,890 units sold with +15% growth). Each card should have a green gradient background, white text, and corresponding icons. Add a prominent donut chart section for category breakdown and a horizontal scrollable list of recent achievements with green accent badges.
